localization of transiently expressed in n. benthamiana when fluorescent chimeras _BLANKM_ or _METHOD_ of _PROTEIN_ were transiently expressed in n. benthamiana leaves using agrobacterium infiltration fluorescence accumulated as dots on the _LOCATION_ of abaxial leaf epidermal cells .
interestingly when the fluorescent chimera was co expressed with an er marker _PROTEIN_ _METHOD_ the punctate labeling pattern of _BLANKP_ correlated with the _LOCATION_ .
